Class EnquiryRepository

java.lang.Object
EnquiryRepository
public class EnquiryRepository extends Object
Entity.

This EnquiryRepository class is for managing enquiries within the system. Provides static methods to add, retrieve, and query enquiries.

  • Method Details

    • addEnquiry

      public static void addEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Adds a new enquiry to the repository.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the Enquiry to add

    • getAllEnquiries

      public static List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Returns all enquiries stored in the repository.
      Returns:
      a list of all Enquiry objects

    • setEnquiries

      public static void setEnquiries(ArrayList<Enquiry> enq)
      Replaces the current list of enquiries with the provided list.
      Parameters:
      enq - the new list of Enquiry objects to set

    • getUserEnquiries

      public static List<Enquiry> getUserEnquiries(Applicant user)
      Returns all enquiries made by a specific applicant, sorted by the project name.
      Parameters:
      user - the Applicant whose enquiries are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of enquiries made by the specified applicant, sorted by project name

    • getProjectEnquiries

      public static List<Enquiry> getProjectEnquiries(Project project)
      Returns all enquiries related to a specific project, sorted by the project name.
      Parameters:
      project - the Project whose enquiries are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of enquiries for the specified project, sorted by project name

    • getUnansweredProjectEnquiries

      public static List<Enquiry> getUnansweredProjectEnquiries(Project project)
      Returns all unanswered enquiries for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - the Project whose unanswered enquiries are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of unanswered enquiries for the specified project

    • getEnquiryById

      public static Enquiry getEnquiryById(int id)
      Finds an enquiry by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the enquiry
      Returns:
      the Enquiry with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • isEmpty

      public static boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the enquiry repository is empty.
      Returns:
      true if there are no enquiries, false otherwise
